snippet: How the new era of superdrones could destabilize East Asia.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Richard Parker warns that United States Navy launch of entirely autonomous combat drone is ominous turn in potentially dangerous military rivalry building between US and China.
lead_paragraph: How the new era of superdrones could destabilize East Asia.

headline.seo: Drones and the Rivalry Between the U.S. and China
